inliveviewandadvancedviewfindermode: Through the Lens (TTL) metering, center weighted, spot or multifield measuring. Center-weighted TTL metering for flash exposure with system conformant SCA-3000/2 standard flash units.
exposuresetting: Manual shutter speed setting with direct dial, A-Mode with direct dial
sensitivityrange: ISO 200 – ISO 3200, PUSH 6400 and PULL 100 available, Auto ISO
microphone: Mono, stereo microphone adapter optional available
imagingplatform: Integrated imaging circuit with Leica Maestro® Image processor
flashsynchronization: Optional triggered at first or second shutter curtain
name: LEICA M (Typ 240), Black Paint
tripodthread: A 1/4 (1/4") DIN made of stainless steel in base plate
filesize: DNG approx. 20 Mbyte – approx. 30 Mbyte (compressed)/ 48,2 MByte (uncompressed), JPEG
newoptionalaccessories: Electronic Viewfinder (EVF-2), Multi-functional Handgrip M, Handgrip M, SCA Adapter Set for Multi-functional Handgrip M, Power Adapter for Multi-functional Handgrip M, Finger loop for Multi-functional Handgrip M, Size S / M / L, Leica Microphone Adapter Set, Leica M-Adapter R, Ever-Ready Case M, Li-ion Battery BP-SCL2, Battery charger BC-SCL2
inclassicviewfindermode: Through the Lens (TTL) metering, center weighted with variable aperture.
audiorecording: Auto level adjustment, manual level adjustment (available while recording), concert preset

material: All-metal case made of die-cast magnesium; synthetic leather covering. Cap and base plate made of brass
electronicviewfinder: Optional available, can be used for Live View and Play functionality
focusmodes: Manual focus with optical rangefinder, Live View, 100%, Live View Zoom, Live View focus peakin
lensmount: Leica M bayonet with additional sensor for 6-bit coding

flashexposuremetering: Control with center-weighted TTL pre-flash metering (with SCA-3501/3502 adapter, or SCA-3000 standard flash unit such as Leica SF 24D/Leica SF 58).

lenssystem: Leica M lenses, Leica R lenses with optional Leica RAdapter M
shutter: Dual type focal plane shutter for classic image exposure and Live view
